item.description:
Lightroom In-Depth is the next installment of 959 PHOTO WORKSHOPS. It will be held Tuesday nights from 6-9pm starting January 29th and ending on February 19th. The details for the course can be found on our website www.959photoworkshops.com

Lightroom is truly a powerful tool and we will be exploring it in-depth in order to give you a better understanding of the program and more freedom while using it. Please make sure to mention the Meetup group when registering as there is a $50 discount. And of course, please let me know if you have any questions. My email is cora@959photoworkshops.com
item.name: Lightroom In-Depth by 959 PHOTO WORKSHOPS
